body: Thank you, Lord DIO. BTW it's made by Herio, a god in the Wholesome Hentai Community

@Anthony728 had to find the sauce, here's the reverse roles without marriage

@Anthony728 the mother found a gentle girl and she wanted to take her in the family. Having her marry her son and take her in as as daughter-in-law is killing 3 birds with one stone since such a gentle girl could also get rid of his phobia. The "aphrodisiac" might've just been the grandma doing a little trolling and actually made a drink to calm people down from having their first time. As for the reverse roles, there's actually a doujin where a girl has a fear of men or big men and a boy she's doing a project with, helps her get rid of phobia.

calm down dude its just a hentai

I was led here by a Wholesome Hentai link, and either my mind's been so twisted over the years, or this isn't wholesome at all. A guy gains a phobia of women, and his mother who should notice something like this basically pushes marriage onto her son (not outright force it, but suggesting marriage for a woman-fearing man is a stupid thing to do), and the way to fix this is to surprise him with a forced aphrodisiac consumption?!! That's arguably rape right there! What if he didn't like the idea of having sex with her?! If the genders were reversed i'm pretty sure this damn thing would have a Mind Break or at least Forced/Rape tag.

Damn, stuff like this pisses me off so much.
My heart melts every time he gets so happy that he is accepted by kasuga

Love a happy ending. Honestly its a bit dissapointing it's not the same girl though, wouldve been an even more interesting story if it was the same girl and now shes feeling guilty over how she hurt him; how she always regretted turning him down.
Beautiful. Absolute masterpiece.
Cuteness overload. 100% wholesome approved.
Wholesome af....
a part of me wanted it to be the childhood friend. i guess thats impossible .

Honestly this kinda angers me, it's like when a chick is afraid of men it's, "you go queen wait til you're ready" a dudes afraid of women, it's "let's force him into a relationship he's not ready for"
This is the kind of stuff that gets me going. Nice plot, hot sex scenes and cute moments - it's all here. Pure bliss.
Very nice.

marriage and everything was turning out to be to good to be true, i was afraid some twist will happen but im glad it remained wholesome through the end. at first i thought wife was the same girl who bullied him as we never saw the face at the start or maybe she will NTR him during their wedding night but boy I'm glad it didn't happen.
